title: D.N.Angel, Vol. 8
description: Thief of the Heart, Thief of the ArtWhen Dark takes the stolen painting to the Niwa home, it turns all black! Daisuke is trapped inside the artwork, where he meets the real Freedert, who tells him the true version of "Ice and Snow." Humans can't live long in Freedert's world--and Dark has to do everything in his power to set Dark free before it's too late!
author: Yukiru Sugisaki
